Parameter Values:
  * year
  * weekOfYear
  * month (1)
  * dayOfMonth 
  * hour
  * minute

  * second

Usage:
{{{
    TimeParameter timeType = TimeParameter.YEAR;
    Password password = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("PASS", timeType);
    String storePass = password.getPassword());
}}}
